#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
#include<math.h>
int reverse(long long int sum)
{
long long int r=0;
while(sum>0)
{
r=(r*10)+(sum%10);
sum=sum/10;
}
return r;
}
 bool ispal(long long int num)
{
if(num == reverse(num))
 return true;
else 
return false;
}
bool isprime(long long int N)
{
long long int i;
for(i=2;i<=N/2;i++)
{
  if(N%i == 0)
    return false;
} 
return true;
}
int main()
{
long long int N;
cin>>N;
if(N%2 == 0)
 N++;
while(true)
 {
   if(ispal(N) && isprime(N))
    break;
   else
    N+=2;
 }
cout<<N<<endl;
return 0;
}
